page.title: 04C.O.D. DONNINGTON, TELFORD
page.content: Donnington is one of three ordnance depots in the country.It covers an area of 313 acres.It is served by 12.9km. of road and 19.3km. of railways.It has 9 major equipment and spares stores.The items handled include field equipment, tanks, vehicles and component parts of complete items, which are despatched all over the world.It also has a small-arms museum. Among the exibits on show are the remains of the shell,a souvenir of the Crimean War, from which all Victoria Crosses are cast. **************** {Army Life.} Men with maps, Men in aeroplanes coming Men with parachutes coming, Marching in step,one,two three. Going to fight,black on their faces. That's life in the army. {Karen.8yrs.}
